metadata.title: CVE-2018-7490 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
uWSGI before 2.0.17 mishandles a DOCUMENT_ROOT check during use of the--php-docroot option, allowing directory traversal.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7490` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 1.9.17.1-5ubuntu0.1
